FrierenMod:PerpetualPower.NAME: Perpetual
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the turn, shuffle #b%d #yMana in your discard pile.

FrierenMod:OutpouringPower.NAME: Outpouring
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #ySynchro a #yMana this turn, gain #b%d #yStrength .

FrierenMod:PajamasFormPower.NAME: Pajamas Form
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, Exhaust ALL #yMana and deal damage equal to #b%d times the amount you Exhaust to ALL enemies. NL (Deal #b%d damage)

FrierenMod:TrickPower.NAME: Trick
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add #yManaConcealment into your hand.

FrierenMod:GainRelicPower.NAME: Find Lost Accessories
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combat, get #b%d random relic.

FrierenMod:RitesPreparationPower.NAME: Preparation of Rites
DESCRIPTIONS: The next #b%d #yMana you #ySynchro will deal 6 damage to All enemies.

FrierenMod:SwitchStrengthAndDexterityPow.NAME: Exchange
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, Switch the amount of your #yStrength and #yDexterity .

FrierenMod:TimeTravelPower.NAME: Time Concept
DESCRIPTIONS: Send your everything #b%d turns into the future.

FrierenMod:ThunderPower.NAME: Destructive Lightning
DESCRIPTIONS: #ySynchro change into #yLimit_Over_Synchro in the rest of the combat.

FrierenMod:AccelerateFlowPower.NAME: Clear Mind
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, #ySynchro changes into #yAccel_Synchro .

FrierenMod:ManaReturnPower.NAME: Mana Return
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever it is attacked, shuffle #b%d #yMana into your discard pile.

FrierenMod:ChantWithoutManaPower.NAME: Magic
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, #yChant can be FREELY activated.

FrierenMod:ChantWithoutManaTimesPower.NAME: Free Chant
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, the next #b%d times you #yChant can be FREELY activated.

FrierenMod:SynchroWithoutManaPower.NAME: Mana Recycle
DESCRIPTIONS: The next #b%d times you #ySynchro is FREE.
This turn, You CANNOT get new #yMana by cards.

FrierenMod:ManaInsteadOfEnergyPower.NAME: Imagination
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, Your cards don't Cost [E] , Cost the same amount of #yMana instead.

FrierenMod:MageStyleChokePower.NAME: Mage Style Choke
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #ySynchro a #yMana this turn, the enemy loses #b%d HP.

FrierenMod:RingletFormPower.NAME: Ringlet Form
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yExhaust a #yMana, gain #b%d #yBlock .

FrierenMod:SealPower.NAME: Seal
DESCRIPTIONS: #yChant #b%d times in one turn to break the seal and add #b%d #yHellFireSummoning into your hand.

FrierenMod:ManaBarricadePower.NAME: Mana Barricade
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, if you have 5 #yMana or more, gain #yBarricade, otherwise, lose #yBarricade.

FrierenMod:FullAheadPower.NAME: Full Ahead
DESCRIPTIONS: After #yChant first time every turn,  gain #b%d #yStrength and #b%d #yDexterity .

FrierenMod:FrierenSuitcasePower.NAME: Frieren's Suitcase
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase your hand size to 13 this combat. NL If your hand is full after you play a card, gain #b%d Block.

FrierenMod:SimmeringPower.NAME: Simmering
DESCRIPTIONS: After #yChant , draw #b%d #yLegendary_Spell .

FrierenMod:FlyingMagicPower.NAME: Flying Magic
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, #yExhaust #b%d Mana in your discard pile.

FrierenMod:OpenTheWaygatePower.NAME: Open The Waygate
DESCRIPTIONS: After #ySynchro #b%d times CONTINUALLY in one turn, take an extra turn after this one, end your turn and remove this power.

FrierenMod:CopyPower.NAME: Replica
DESCRIPTIONS: When taken unblocked damage, gain the same amount of #rMana . NL When player gain #yBlock , Gain the same amount of #yBlock . NL It will use #rApex_Of_The_Magic when its HP less than 100!

FrierenMod:EnemyManaPower.NAME: Mana
DESCRIPTIONS: Exhaust corresponding amount of #rMana to cast #rSpell.

DESCRIPTIONS: Spell_To_Protect_Treasure_Vault.

FrierenMod:WeakenedChantPower.NAME: Be Weaken in Chant
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, #yChant will Exhaust #b%d more #yMana.
...Frieren...
...Kill...
...Monster...

FrierenMod:PaperPlaneSpellPower.NAME: Spell that makes paper plane fly further
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next #b%d times #yAttack deals double damage. NL #ySynchro #b%d times CONTINUALLY to increase #b%d times.

FrierenMod:FrushDownPower.NAME: Frush Down
DESCRIPTIONS: After #ySynchro #b%d times CONTINUALLY, draw #b%d cards and discard #b%d cards from the far left in your hand.

FrierenMod:MimicPower.NAME: Mimic
DESCRIPTIONS: After you played #b%d cards, end your turn, remove your #yMana and apply #yDark_and_Scary to you.

FrierenMod:DarkPower.NAME: Dark and Scary
DESCRIPTIONS: You can't see clearly in the Mimic...
So dark, and #r@Scary@

FrierenMod:SwallowedPower.NAME: Swallowed
DESCRIPTIONS: Decrease your hand size by #b&d this combat.
